text: They made their first public appearance together back in May. And Heidi Klum still can't keep her hands or lips off her boyfriend Tom Kaulitz, even when they are out to lunch with her daughter Helene, 14. The 45 - year - old supermodel was spotted kissing her 29 - year - old musician beau on Sunday, while at a restaurant in West Hollywood.
